verses.verse: Now the divisions <S%H4256><s%> of the descendants <S%H1121><s%> of Aaron <S%H175><s%> [were these: ] the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Aaron <S%H175><s%> [were] Nadab, <S%H5070><s%> Abihu, <S%H30><s%> Eleazar, <S%H499><s%> and Ithamar. <S%H385><s%>

But Nadab <S%H5070><s%> and Abihu <S%H30><s%> died <S%H4191><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> their father and had <S%H1><s%> no <S%H1961><s%> sons. <S%H3808><s%> So Eleazar <S%H1121><s%> and Ithamar <S%H499><s%> served <S%H385><s%> as priests. <S%H3547><s%>

And David, <S%H1732><s%> with Zadok <S%H6659><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Eleazar <S%H499><s%> and Ahimelech <S%H288><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Ithamar, <S%H385><s%> divided <S%H2505><s%> them according to their offices <S%H6486><s%> for their ministry. <S%H5656><s%>

Since more <S%H7227><s%> chief <S%H7218><s%> men <S%H1397><s%> were found <S%H4672><s%> from the descendants <S%H1121><s%> of Eleazar <S%H499><s%> than <S%H4480><s%> the descendants <S%H1121><s%> of Ithamar, <S%H385><s%> they divided <S%H2505><s%> them thus: [there were] sixteen <S%H8337><s%> <S%H6240><s%> heads <S%H7218><s%> of fathers' households <S%H1004><s%> of the descendants <S%H1121><s%> of Eleazar, <S%H499><s%> and eight <S%H8083><s%> of the descendants <S%H1121><s%> of Ithamar <S%H385><s%> according to their fathers' households. <S%H1004><s%>

Thus they were divided <S%H2505><s%> by lot, <S%H1486><s%> the one <S%H428><s%> as the other; <S%H428><s%> for they were officers <S%H8269><s%> of the sanctuary <S%H6944><s%> and officers <S%H8269><s%> of God, <S%H430><s%> both from the descendants <S%H1121><s%> of Eleazar <S%H499><s%> and the descendants <S%H1121><s%> of Ithamar. <S%H385><s%>

And Shemaiah, <S%H8098><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Nethanel <S%H5417><s%> the scribe, <S%H9373><s%> from the Levites, <S%H3881><s%> recorded <S%H3789><s%> them in the presence <S%H6440><s%> of the king, <S%H4428><s%> the princes, <S%H8269><s%> Zadok <S%H6659><s%> the priest, <S%H3548><s%> Ahimelech <S%H288><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Abiathar, <S%H54><s%> and the heads <S%H7218><s%> of the fathers' [households] of the priests <S%H3548><s%> and of the Levites; <S%H3881><s%> one <S%H259><s%> father's household <S%H1004><s%> taken <S%H270><s%> for Eleazar <S%H499><s%> and one taken <S%H270><s%> for Ithamar. <S%H385><s%>
Now the first <S%H7223><s%> lot <S%H1486><s%> came <S%H3318><s%> out for Jehoiarib, <S%H3080><s%> the second <S%H8145><s%> for Jedaiah, <S%H3048><s%>
the third <S%H7992><s%> for Harim, <S%H2766><s%> the fourth <S%H7243><s%> for Seorim, <S%H8188><s%>
the fifth <S%H2549><s%> for Malchijah, <S%H4441><s%> the sixth <S%H8345><s%> for Mijamin, <S%H4326><s%>
the seventh <S%H7637><s%> for Hakkoz, <S%H6976><s%> the eighth <S%H8066><s%> for Abijah, <S%H29><s%>
the ninth <S%H8671><s%> for Jeshua, <S%H3091><s%> the tenth <S%H6224><s%> for Shecaniah, <S%H7935><s%>
the eleventh <S%H6249><s%> <S%H6240><s%> for Eliashib, <S%H475><s%> the twelfth <S%H8147><s%> <S%H6240><s%> for Jakim, <S%H3356><s%>
the thirteenth <S%H7969><s%> <S%H6240><s%> for Huppah, <S%H2647><s%> the fourteenth <S%H702><s%> <S%H6240><s%> for Jeshebeab, <S%H3428><s%>
the fifteenth <S%H2568><s%> <S%H6240><s%> for Bilgah, <S%H1083><s%> the sixteenth <S%H8337><s%> <S%H6240><s%> for Immer, <S%H564><s%>
the seventeenth <S%H7651><s%> <S%H6240><s%> for Hezir, <S%H2387><s%> the eighteenth <S%H8083><s%> <S%H6240><s%> for Happizzez, <S%H6483><s%>
the nineteenth <S%H8672><s%> <S%H6240><s%> for Pethahiah, <S%H6611><s%> the twentieth <S%H6242><s%> for Jehezkel, <S%H3168><s%>
the twenty-first for Jachin, <S%H3199><s%> the twenty-second for Gamul, <S%H1577><s%>
the twenty-third for Delaiah, <S%H1806><s%> the twenty-fourth for Maaziah. <S%H4590><s%>

These <S%H428><s%> were their offices <S%H6486><s%> for their ministry, <S%H5656><s%> when [they] came <S%H935><s%> in to the house <S%H1004><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> according to the ordinance <S%H4941><s%> [given] to them through <S%H3027><s%> Aaron <S%H175><s%> their father, just <S%H1><s%> as the Lord <S%H9201><s%> God <S%H3068><s%> of Israel <S%H430><s%> had commanded <S%H3478><s%> him.

Now for the rest <S%H3498><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Levi: <S%H3878><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Amram, <S%H6019><s%> Shubael; <S%H7619><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Shubael, <S%H7619><s%> Jehdeiah. <S%H3165><s%>
Of Rehabiah: <S%H7345><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Rehabiah, <S%H7345><s%> Isshiah <S%H3449><s%> the first. <S%H7218><s%>
Of the Izharites, <S%H3325><s%> Shelomoth; <S%H8013><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Shelomoth, <S%H8013><s%> Jahath. <S%H3189><s%>

And the sons <S%H1121><s%> [of Hebron: ] Jeriah <S%H3404><s%> [the first,] Amariah <S%H568><s%> the second, <S%H8145><s%> Jahaziel <S%H3166><s%> the third, <S%H7992><s%> Jekameam <S%H3360><s%> the fourth. <S%H7243><s%>
[Of] the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Uzziel, <S%H5816><s%> Micah; <S%H4318><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Micah, <S%H4318><s%> Shamir. <S%H9613><s%>
The brother <S%H251><s%> of Micah, <S%H4318><s%> Isshiah; <S%H3449><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Isshiah, <S%H3449><s%> Zechariah. <S%H2148><s%>
The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Merari, <S%H4847><s%> Mahli <S%H4249><s%> and Mushi; <S%H4187><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Jaaziah, <S%H3269><s%> Beno. <S%H9057><s%>
The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Merari: <S%H4847><s%> by Jaaziah <S%H3269><s%> [were] Beno, <S%H9057><s%> Shoham, <S%H7719><s%> Zaccur, <S%H2139><s%> and Ibri. <S%H5681><s%>
By Mahli: <S%H4249><s%> Eleazar, <S%H499><s%> who had <S%H1961><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> sons. <S%H1121><s%>
By Kish: <S%H7027><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Kish, <S%H7027><s%> Jerahmeel. <S%H3396><s%>

And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Mushi: <S%H4187><s%> Mahli, <S%H4249><s%> Eder, <S%H5740><s%> and Jerimoth. <S%H3406><s%> These <S%H428><s%> [were] the sons <S%H1121><s%> of the Levites <S%H3881><s%> according to their fathers' households. <S%H1004><s%>

These <S%H1992><s%> also <S%H1571><s%> cast <S%H5307><s%> lots <S%H1486><s%> just <S%H5980><s%> as their relatives <S%H251><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Aaron <S%H175><s%> in the presence <S%H6440><s%> of David <S%H1732><s%> the king, <S%H4428><s%> Zadok, <S%H6659><s%> Ahimelech, <S%H288><s%> and the heads <S%H7218><s%> of the fathers' [households] of the priests <S%H3548><s%> and of the Levites <S%H3881><s%> â€“ the head <S%H7218><s%> of fathers' [households] as well <S%H5980><s%> as those of his younger <S%H6996><s%> brother. <S%H251><s%>
